title: In Times Like These: Books 1-3
description:
A universe of adventureâ€”All in one place. 

Can you outrun the past? Can you outlive the future? One time traveler must find out. Accidental time traveler, Ben Travers, is thrown into a multiverse of adventure in this action adventure through past and future. This compilation includes: Clockwise & Gone, In Times Like These, The Chronothon, The Day After Never, and The Warp Clock. 
Start your time travel adventure today, because yesterday may be too late!
author: Nathan Van Coops
